settings.text: Your complete wash day routine for deeply moisturized, defined curls and coils.
Our collection of hydrating staples that'll save parched curls, even on the go.

settings.heading: Details
settings.content:
Limited time only: FREE 4U Bonnet with bundle purchase. ($11.99 value.)

As the temperature cools, curls are calling for more moisture. Treat your strands to these moisture-rich picks made to deeply hydrate and wake up curls.

Safe for: Color treated, keratin treated, chemically-treated, and relaxed hair.

settings.heading: How to use
settings.content:
Dry curls? Not on our watch. This set was curated to provide your curls with the moisture and definition they need on a weekly basis.

Moisturizing Shampoo
Apply to wet hair and scalp and massage into a rich, aromatic lather that softens curls without stripping essential moisture. Rinse clean, revealing detangled, nourished hair with extra shine.

Moisturizing Conditioner
After cleansing with shampoo, gently massage into hair from mid-shaft to ends. Rinse thoroughly to reveal nourished, frizz free, detangled hair curls.

Leave-In Curl Cream (Travel Size)
After cleansing, use a comb to evenly distribute product through damp hair. Air-dry or use a diffuser to achieve nourished, detangled curls with definition and movement.

Curl Refresher Mist
On non-wash days, spray this lightweight mist evenly onto hair and scalp for featherlite moisture and enhanced bounce.

settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content:
Moisturizing Shampoo
Water/Aqua/Eau, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Coco-Glucoside, C13-15 Alkane, Glycerin, Panthenol, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Oil, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Glyceryl Oleate, Eclipta Prostrata Extract, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Sorbitan Oleate Decylglucoside Crosspolymer, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Levulinate, Sodium Chloride, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Fragrance/Parfum, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool

Moisturizing Conditioner
Water/Aqua/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, C13-15 Alkane, Squalane, Brassicamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Glycerin, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Panthenol, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract, Tocopherol, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Oil, Cassia Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Eclipta Prostrata Extract, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Aspartic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Gluconate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Fragrance/Parfum, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool

Leave - in Curl Cream
Water/Aqua/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, C13-15 Alkane, Glycerin, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Squalane, Brassicamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Extract, Panthenol, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Oil, Salvia Hispanica Seed Extract, Tocopherol, Cassia Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Aspartic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Sodium Gluconate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Fragrance/Parfum, Amyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Methyl Ionone, Limonene, Linalool

Curl Refresher Mist
Water/Aqua/Eau, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sorbitan Oleate Decylglucoside Crosspolymer, C13-15 Alkane, Panthenol, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Extract, Salvia Hispanica Seed Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Levulinate, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Fragrance/Parfum, Benzyl Salicylate, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool

settings.title: 1Moisturizing Shampoo
settings.description: Apply to wet hair and scalp and massage into a rich, aromatic lather that softens curls without stripping essential moisture. Rinse clean, revealing detangled, nourished hair with extra shine.

settings.title: 2Moisturizing Conditioner
settings.description: After cleansing with shampoo, gently massage into hair from mid-shaft to ends. Rinse thoroughly to reveal nourished, frizz free, detangled hair curls.

settings.title: 3Leave-In Curl Cream
settings.description: After cleansing, use a comb to evenly distribute product through damp hair. Air-dry or use a diffuser to achieve nourished, detangled curls with definition and movement.

settings.title: 4Curl Defining Gel
settings.description: Apply to damp hair using a wide-tooth comb to evenly distribute. Style anyway you want—your curls, your rules.

settings.title: 5Curl Refresher Mist
settings.description: On non-wash days, spray this lightweight mist evenly onto hair and scalp for featherlite moisture and enhanced bounce.

settings.title: 6Multi-use Hair Oil
settings.description: Apply as a pre-wash to help prevent breakage and add sheen, massaging into scalp and following with shampoo and conditioner. Use as a finishing oil by applying a few drops to ends of hair to enhance shine, repair split ends, and keep frizz at bay. Mix into your favorite styling products and conditioners for an added moisture boost.

settings.subtitle:
1Moisturizing Shampoo
Apply to wet hair and scalp and massage into a rich, aromatic lather that softens curls without stripping essential moisture. Rinse clean, revealing detangled, nourished hair with extra shine.

2Moisturizing Conditioner
After cleansing with shampoo, gently massage into hair from mid-shaft to ends. Rinse thoroughly to reveal nourished, frizz free, detangled hair curls.

3Leave-In Curl Cream
After cleansing, use a comb to evenly distribute product through damp hair. Air-dry or use a diffuser to achieve nourished, detangled curls with definition and movement.

4Curl Defining Gel
Apply to damp hair using a wide-tooth comb to evenly distribute. Style anyway you want—your curls, your rules.

5Curl Refresher Mist
On non-wash days, spray this lightweight mist evenly onto hair and scalp for featherlite moisture and enhanced bounce.

6Multi-use Hair Oil
Apply as a pre-wash to help prevent breakage and add sheen, massaging into scalp and following with shampoo and conditioner. Use as a finishing oil by applying a few drops to ends of hair to enhance shine, repair split ends, and keep frizz at bay. Mix into your favorite styling products and conditioners for an added moisture boost.
